# T4cluster : Tools for Cluster Analysis <a href='https://kyoustat.com/T4cluster/'><img src='man/figures/logo.png' align="right" height="150" /></a>

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.com/kyoustat/T4cluster.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/kyoustat/T4cluster)
<!-- badges: end -->

**T4cluster** is an **R** package designed as a computational toolkit with comprehensive coverage 
in relevant topics around the study of cluster analysis. 

## Installation

You can install the released version of T4cluster from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("T4cluster")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("kyoustat/T4cluster")
```
